author: perrotta
body:
Backport of #19677

Add fillDescriptions method for htt top jet producer, a class derived from FastjetJetProducer who inherited that method from the parent one. 

This solves the issue mentioned in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swDevelopment/3415.html

@Martin-Grunewald @rappoccio
title: Add fill descriptions to htt top jet producer 92X
